item.description:
Want to get some new movies? Do you have any DVDs that you don't watch anymore? Then join us for dinner at Bertucci's Restaurant in Framingham followed by a DVD swap. We will be swapping new and/or used DVDs. Please be sure that your DVDs are playable and not scratched. You may bring more than one movie if you would like.

Please note that once you swap movies, your original DVD will NOT be returned. Please no adult movies, exercise or instructional dvds. DVD swap is optional- everyone is welcome to join us for dinner.

Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Dinner and DVD Swap at Berttucci's Restaurant
